title: WHY ASCENSION
body: Seriously...don't tell me we have another 2 weeks in a row of ascension

replies.body: who even plays RGM's, if i wanted to get raged at for having fun i may aswell just play the rift.
what is your issue, not liking urf, not liking RGM, whats next, saying that you want more poro king
rotating game modes are supposed to be fun, but in my experience they just end up like any other mode, full of serious ragers who bm if you try to have fun.

Well, its unfortunate that we have Ascension but lets get serious. If we had URF as much as Ascension, we'd be bored of URF. I guess Riot wants to keep all the fun gamemodes as interesting as possible and just use the unpopular ones as placeholders
tho having only 3 times last year was unfair.

> Seriously...don't tell me we have another 2 weeks in a row of ascension

Ok then, I wont.

Doesn't make it any less true, though.
We have another two weeks in a row of ascension.
